_header: I grace dieu queen and heavenly princess
Title(s): Pèlerinage de l’âme; ‘The epistle of grace sent to the seek man’
_description: Thomas Hoccleve, ‘The epistle of grace sent to the seek man’, in the English translation of the Pèlerinage de l’âme — twenty-six stanzas rhyme royal

Bod770.First Lines:
I Grace quene of heuenly princesseas deput by þe souerayne
                    kyng eterne…
Bod770.Last Lines:
…þy schalt be list up into heue blisEternal myrþis
                    schaltou neuer mys
Bod770.Attributed Title: This is the pistil that grace sent to the seke ssoule (f. 13)

OxfCCC237.First Lines:
I grace qwene of heuenely pryncesseAs debyte to þe souereygne
                    eterne…
OxfCCC237.Last Lines:
…Þou schalt be lyfte vp in to hevyn blysseEternall
                    myrthis schalt þu nevyr mysse
OxfCCC237.Attributed Title:
This is þe Apistell of grace dien sende þo þilke soule (f.
                        32v)

CamGon124.First Lines:
I Grace whene & heuenli pryncessAs depute by þe souereyn
                    kyng eterne…
CamGon124.Last Lines:
…Thou schalt be had up in to heuen blysseEternall myrthys
                    schalt þu neuer mysse
CamGon124.Attributed Title:
This is þe epystyl þat grace dieu send to þe seke soule (p.
                    7)

CULKk17.First Lines:
I Grace quene and heuenly princesseAs deput be þe souereyn
                    kyng eterne…
CULKk17.Last Lines:
…Tho xalt be had vp in to heuen blysseEternal blysse xal
                    þou neuere mysse
CULKk17.Attributed Title:
her endith þe drem of þe pilgrimage of þe soule (f.
                        124v)

BLAdd34193.First Lines:
I grate quene of heuenly princesOs depicte by ȝe souereyn
                    kinge eterne…
BLAdd34193.Last Lines:
…So þat þou shall be lefte vpe into heuen
                    blisEuerlastenge mirthe shall þou not mys
BLAdd34193.Attributed Title:
This is þe pistell þat grace dieu sende to the saule
                        (19v)

BLEge615.First Lines: I grace quen and heuenly princesseAs depute be the souereyn eterne…
BLEge615.Last Lines: …Thu schalt be haued up in to hevene blisseEternall myrthes schalt þu neuer mysse
BLEge615.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             “Hoccleve’s Works: The Regement of Princes and fourteen minor
                poems.” 
             EETS
         e.s. 72 (1897); repr. 1988: xxiii-xxviii.

NYPLSpenc19.First Lines:
I Grace quene and heuenly princesseAs depicte by the souereyn kyng
                    eterne…
NYPLSpenc19.Last Lines:
…So that thou shalt ben had vp in to heuen blisseEternal
                    myrthes shaltow neuere misse
NYPLSpenc19.Attributed Title: The Epistil of Grace sent to the sike man
